review.reviewBody: Love this restaurant. Have been coming here for years and am so glad I can order it at home now!
Deep-Fried Chicken with Sweet and Sour Sauce/甜酸雞球 was horrible. Dry and tasted like it was old and microwaved
The amount is small considering the price :(

I had a huge craving for duck, ordered duck Sau téed Sliced Duck Meat with Pineapple/菠蘿炒鴨片 and got some kind of chicken stir fry??????????????????  Allergies.. who cares?  Lol and chrged for it. Hmm. Maybe next time I send you money and YOU DECIDE WHAT I EAT.
